pullRequest.title: ProviderManager should have a varargs constructor
pullRequest.bodyText:
Added varargs constructor to ProviderManager.
Updated ProviderManagerTests to use the new syntax and fix the check for empty list.

Fixes gh-7713

nodes.bodyText: Thanks for these cleanup items, too. Will you please put them in a separate commit (same PR)? That is, any code changes that aren't directly related to the new constructor, let's separate them into their own commit. This simplifies maintenance.

commit.message:
ProviderManager should have a varargs constructor

- Added varargs constructor to ProviderManager.
- Added check for null values in AuthenticationProvider list.
- Updated ProviderManagerTests to test for null values using both constructors.

Fixes gh-7713
